name: errorlens
description: Improve the highlighting of errors, warnings and other language diagnostics.

errorLens.errorColor.description: The background color used to highlight lines containing errors. (Alpha is used)

errorLens.errorTextColor.description: The text color used to highlight lines containing errors. (Alpha is used)

errorLens.warningColor.description: The background color used to highlight lines containing warnings. (Alpha is used)

errorLens.warningTextColor.description: The text color used to highlight lines containing warnings. (Alpha is used)

errorLens.infoColor.description: The background color used to highlight lines containing info. (Alpha is used)

errorLens.infoTextColor.description: The text color used to highlight lines containing info. (Alpha is used)

errorLens.hintColor.description: The background color used to highlight lines containing hints. (Alpha is used)

errorLens.hintTextColor.description: The text color used to highlight lines containing hints. (Alpha is used)

errorLens.fontStyle.description: Show ErrorLens annotations in Italics, or not?

errorLens.fontWeight.description: Specifies the font weight for ErrorLens annotations.

errorLens.fontMargin.description: Distance between end of the code line, and the start of the ErrorLens annotation. (CSS units).

errorLens.enabledDiagnosticLevels.description: Specify which diagnostic levels are enhanced. e.g. [ 'error', 'warning' ]. Valid values are any or all of: 'error', 'warning', 'info' & 'hint'

errorLens.statusBarControl.description: Specify when the ErrorLens status bar text should be shown.

errorLens.addAnnotationTextPrefixes.description: If 'true', prefixes the diagnostic severity ('Error:', 'Warning:' etc) to ErrorLens annotations.
